name: While the world sleeps
description:
Disclaimer: There's no gameplay besides running around a small map. Don't go into this with some other expectation.

Street lights and vending machines illuminate the night. These are normally made to serve a large amount of people but you're the only one awake. This game explores the feeling of being the only one awake at night, walking around and seeing the quiet cityscapes and the freedom of wandering around aimlessly. Personally, this feeling tends to be the reason why I usually sleep when the sun rises (should definitely fix that) - the feeling of time slowing down, the complete tranquillity.

The following was a submission for RMIT University - Bachelor of Design (Games) Y1S2 - Project 1 (Trash game).

All assets used are third-party assets.
